website_summaries.verdict: With the QuietComfort 3s, Bose has done a remarkable job of shrinking its popular noise-canceling headphones while achieving similarly impressive sound quality--but that engineering feat doesn't come cheap.
pros: Bose's QuietComfort 3 headphones are a smaller and more compact follow-up to the QuietComfort 2s

They offer a more compact design, extracomfortable cushy foam earpieces, a rechargeable battery, full sound, and effective noise-canceling circuitry, and they fold up for storage in the included carrying case
Additionally, Bose offers a 30-day home trial
cons: The Bose QuietComfort 3s are even more expensive than their predecessors
And when the battery dies, so does the music

customer_reviews.title: Headphones do NOT work properly....
customer_reviews.text: Paid lots of money for these Bose Headphones. Once I got over the ocean going to Africa, I plugged them in and ONLY THE RIGHT SIDE WORKED. Tried other cords (hard to find because each end is different size!). I'm running all over the Denver, Frankfurt and Cape Town airports trying different cords. Tried this unit in three different players including the airplane's inputs. DOES NOT WORK PROPERLY. Back it goes. Part of 17,000 miles vacation ruined.... NOT HAPPY.
customer_reviews.author: Gun Runner

customer_reviews.title: They work great! Am considering upgrading to a wireless set of ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these used. Took a chance. They work great! Am considering upgrading to a wireless set of Bose. I was having difficulty hearing books on tape or music from my iPod while flying using regular ear buds - what a world of difference these make! I could still hear voices coming over the aircraft speakers, and some other background noises, but these head phones have such good sound quality, and are so good at masking droning noises, that the background noises I could hear were not bothersome. I've started wearing them around the house (hubby and kids don't like that). :)
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great noise cancelling headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love these guys. They charge pretty quickly, and last for very long flights (didn't charge it fully and it lasts for a 14 hour flight from Japan). Cancels general annoying noise, like all airplane background noise the actual plane makes. Generally comfortable for a few hours, but if you wear a very long time they start to ge that around the ears and make you sweat. I suspect most noise canceling headphones are like this however due to the need for a secure connection. I also love BOSE customer support. I have never had an issue with these, but my in-ear BOSE have broken a few times and they replace them no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: M. Blonski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bose QC 3 Headphones
customer_reviews.text: This is the earlier model, they have made lots of improvements but I was able to replace the one that I think the caregiver took. As long as you don't have the music blasting you can pretty much hear when someone talks to you. I go to the hospital every 8 weeks for 12 hours for immune infusion and it blocks out the other noise but I can hear the nurses when they come in to check vitals. Its the only place I use it since I'm homebound. Just love it
customer_reviews.author: noknots

customer_reviews.title: Love QuietComfort 3s!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these! I was torn between buying the bigger pair, the QuietComfort 15, like my husband has, but I am so pleased I didn't. These fit my head better, although the top part is still too tall to touch my head while wearing the ear parts. I love that all I have to do is plug in the rechargeable battery for an hour or two the night before a flight. They have lasted plenty long for our domestic flights as well as to the Caribbean. Comfy and not too bulky or heavy like the 15s. I travel in comfort! Not to mention the iPod/iPhone cord works really well and is very handy.
customer_reviews.author: bigtoe

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after only 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for my blind mother and reassured her these would be the best headphones she will ever get because listening to music is what she does for a hobby since she can't watch tv or do much due to her disability and they just stopped working all together for no reason whatsoever, for the price and the company BOSE I expected them to last longer than a ten dollar pair from Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Rhainnon

customer_reviews.title: Unrelaible connection via female Jack on headphones
customer_reviews.text: The product is great when it works it must be connected by a male 3.5 mm Jack to headphones this particular set has a bad female Jack on the headphones and has to be move to a certain spot to make contact and listen to music. I'd it moves it losses connection. I find this annoying and frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur M.

customer_reviews.title: Would take these over beats by dre any day.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing. I had a pair of beats headphones before this but man am I glad I upgraded. These headphones are lighter than the beats and do not give you the headaches and fatigue from wearing them. I will say that after wearing for several hours I had to remove them to let my ears breathe a little (they can make your ears a bit hot after long periods), but the sound proofing is great and I can wear them for over 10 hours without having to recharge the batteries. They aren't quite as loud as the beats I owned previously but because of the noise cancellation the sound was better.
customer_reviews.author: lillacka

customer_reviews.title: I now feel spoiled, I won't wear anything else.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the to use for better concentration at work. I have three people near me that are on conference calls 80% of the day, put these on set the volume to 5 of 16 on my iPhone and I'm transported to my own world. (Using ear buds I used to turn volume to max and could see hear the coworkers' conversations.). I wear these about 8 hours a day I can get 4-5 days on one charge and very comfortable to wear, ear buds are now uncomfortable to me. Bought a spare battery so I wouldn't have to wait the 2 hours for full charge.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect! Superb noise cancellation. Works great in airplanes and cancels noise. I use them in barts in San Francisco, cancels half of the noise. Great bass in music and movies!!!! The clarity is just awesome. Every detail is hearable.
customer_reviews.author: Anvar Jamal Saifi

customer_reviews.title: Best Noice Cancelling Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Its been less than a month that i have owned these headphones. They are pricey but i believe that it was a good decision that i went for these headphones. They are very effective in noise cancellation and have a clear and great sound quality. They are perfect for travelling specially if you are travelling by Airplane. QC3 are capable of filter noise up to 80% though you can still hear people talking around you but once your music is on you can barely hear them. I am overall satisfied with these headphones. Build quality, Sound Quality, they are simply awesome. I am loving every bit of them. Thanx Bose...
customer_reviews.author: Aftab Ahmed Khan

customer_reviews.title: An Extremely happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I just love my Bose headphone! The vendor was very courteous and even sent me an extra battery at no charge. I am extremely happy with my purchase and would recommend this vendor to all my friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: M. Robert

customer_reviews.title: Easy to travel with, good charge, squeezes ears
customer_reviews.text: Compact, easy to travel with, good noise canceling. Good battery life. I found that during longer uses (2 hours+) my ears hurt from being pushed down by the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: DancerForLife

customer_reviews.title: Can't be beat
customer_reviews.text: I bought three pairs of other noise canceling headphones trying to avoid spending the big bucks on these. I travel two or three times a month on business and the plane flights seriously drain me and leave me tired. These headphones knocked the noise fatigue right now. Don't go cheap on some other brand that will break after some use, or only block a small amount of noise. Get the Bose now, ask someone on your next flight who has them if you can compare. They are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Short

customer_reviews.title: These were NOT as described. They are a VERY ...
customer_reviews.text: These were NOT as described. They are a VERY worn American Airlines headphones. They still work, but they needed parts replaced and look tacky with the AA logo on them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Item as Described
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time that I purchase a used product. Bose is expensive and got this set for my ADHD child who loves doing her work with her own noise cancellation headset because it helps her concentrate. The item was in pristine condition as described. I did replace the ear cushions but only because I am a complete germaphobe!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Bought Used Unit
customer_reviews.text: It works like new. Vacuumed the case a bit, otherwise fine. Noise canceling is greater than anticipated. Cancels or greatly reduces all kinds of noise. Noise is around the house, A/C, appliances, vehicles passing on the street, overhead fans, electric transformers, etc. are all greatly reduced or canceled completely. Can be used to achieve near quiet without music. This is something rare. Also the dynamics of music without competing sound is unbelievably fine. Have many other head phones and ear phones and will not use them again.
customer_reviews.author: King Sugar

customer_reviews.title: LexasAudio does a great job supporting these older units
customer_reviews.text: This is a restored, older product so i wasn't surprised that the battery weakened out. QC1 batteries are not easy to find. Lexasaudio was great and supported the product all the way. They shipped a new one out immediately, even though we were outside the warranty period. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Jones

customer_reviews.title: High Price to Pay but Worth the Cost
customer_reviews.text: They feel amazing and sound amazing. I was very hesitant to buy these due to the high cost but I have not had any other complaints. It would be to see "Made in USA" for Bose items since you are paying for quality but sadly they are made in China. All in all they are great and the battery holds a charge very nicely. Also, making calls through your cell phone is great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Not complete but still happy and impressed
customer_reviews.text: I love Bose products. When I made this purchase at the price, I got just what it says...the headphones. I now need the charger. I love the noise cancellation of these soft cup headphones. I thought it was going to be weak (the headphones had some power left for me to test) but was very surprised! I barely heard myself talk! Overall...I'm pleased with the product and purchase. I'm not immediately pressed for the usage of them and can hold off till I purchase the battery charger.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: After the 2nd or 3rd month, the left side stopped working. Now it's just a paperweight in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: FM

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!!! Very happy. Quick delivery. I use them for transcribing and the quality sound is superb!
customer_reviews.author: June L.Cain

customer_reviews.title: The battery is awesome. It lasts for weeks and recharges very quickly
customer_reviews.text: Had an older version from many years ago, and bought this primarily for the rechargeable battery. The battery is awesome. It lasts for weeks and recharges very quickly. I found the on the ear better than the over the ear pads in the older model. Used primarily for noise cancellation, which works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and noise canceling.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and noise canceling for air travel, especially when sitting behind the engines. Very compact and I like the removable battery so I can carry a charged spare.
customer_reviews.author: Greg L

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Lives up to its name as it is indeed comfortable and quiet as it effectively shields out background noise giving clear and precise sound. A joy to use. The only minor drawback is having to remember to charge it after about 20h of continuous use, and as there's no battery indicator you don't really know when it will run out. A way to get around that is to buy a spare battery.
customer_reviews.author: nutbag

customer_reviews.title: A quality Bose product
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Made the child screaming all of the way cross country from Atlanta almost bearable. I am sure I will be disappointed like others when the ear pieces start to deteriorate as the coverings seem paper thin. In addition, some design work on the case to better manage cords seems a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: anonymojs

customer_reviews.title: Let's the music/movie AND NOTHING ELSE inside your head
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an awe-struck fan of Bose, but I am definitely impressed by these. On long, across-the-world trips (SMF - MCT), they don't become uncomfortable, the fidelity is truly impressive and the noise cancelling feature is very relaxing. In addition to my wife, just the right travelling companion on those long trips.
customer_reviews.author: TomE

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice sounding Bose headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice sounding Bose headphones. They work very well with my Flat screen smart TV, as well as with my computer and laptop.The sound is remarkable , clear and crisp, the bass tones is just as rich...I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Best noise cancelation headphone
customer_reviews.text: Best headphone i ever had! If u have been bothered by noise for a long time, this is ur best choice! I have 10 roomies, they almost drove me crazy because they all play league of legend together. But after i got this amazing headphone, plug it in my iphone, play music, i felt like this world suddenly became so quiet. It is the best headphone i ever had, buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Doraemon

customer_reviews.title: Worth almost every penny
customer_reviews.text: I understand that this is expensive, but it's definitely worth it. I hate long trips, but thanks to these headphones time flies by. They are super comfortable and I have fallen asleep with them on a few times. The noise cancelation is second to none. While it won't completely eliminate every external sound, it does a pretty good job at eliminating most. The only complaint is the overall feel of the product. It's made of plastic and feels cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Othniel Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Very happy (well, relative to headphone happiness levels)
customer_reviews.text: These were low cost, returned headphones. I had previously had a pair (new) and these work just as well. Very happy (well, relative to headphone happiness levels).
customer_reviews.author: Floyd P. Mclaughlin, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value + Amazing Performance
customer_reviews.text: I can't live without these. They're better than the new models. I personally like the on-ear models (these ones) They're so amazing. I sometimes don't even plug them into my music device. I just like to have them on the drown out the mid-ton and high frequency noise. The price just dropped from the time I bought them a year + ago. So it's a great value and amazing performance!
customer_reviews.author: Chimdi Azubuike

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones so far
customer_reviews.text: I've had Sol republic master tracks, V-Moda M-100, Bose over ear. Test Beats studio, M-50, Seinheiser and so far these are the best headphones I ever listened. Look no further and save some money buying this from the beginning. Sound is great, with noise canceling, looks good, light and comfortable, have never ran out of battery. Cable is a little too long but not a big issue.
customer_reviews.author: M3o

customer_reviews.title: does the job done wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: Frequent traveler. 5-6x per year. very happy with the level of comfort and noise cancellation. When you have it on high volume and your immerse on your movie, you seem to forget that your on the plane. And you will start to appreciate it as soon as you took it off. This is my first noise cancelling headphones so i cant talk about other headphones. My daughter uses the BEAT headphones which are good in base but does not cancel noise. For my fellow traveler i would highly recommend this headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Crisanto Ortiz Luis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These were a Christmas gift from my husband. I have small ears so I can never wear ear buds, and headphones are usually too awkward. The Bose QC3 are perfect for me! They fit well, but aren't too snug. The noise cancelling is terrific. I wore them during a long flight to Hawaii and they were great. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: SBGAL

customer_reviews.title: Last Pair of Headphones You Will Buy
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are worth every penny of the price. Bose does not disappoint. Whether it's riding on a plane, killing the background noise in the Dr's office or just having quite in the midst of chaos, these are great. They also serve as headphones in which to listen to music. 24 hours of charging on the battery and it comes with a hard case for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: They really DO shut out annoying noise!
customer_reviews.text: These really do shut out most background and outside noises. Screaming children. People on their phones. Other people's loud music. They are lifesavers when you take public transportation and just want to zone out and have peace.
customer_reviews.author: SanD Q

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for drowning out the world around you!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my husband is always watching television very loudly. He never really watches anything that interests me so I use my headphones and Ipad Mini to watch whatever I want. It has worked out harmoniously!
customer_reviews.author: LBS

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as gifts for colleagues. I purchased my own several years ago. They are still going strong, with replacement of the ear-pads and the audio cable over time.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Del Regno

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected
customer_reviews.text: While these headphones are pricey, they are worth every penny. The noise canceling is really quite amazing. The included inline remote works well with the iPhone 4S. In terms of comfort; it is easy to forget these are on your head when you are just using them for noise canceling. The bottom line... I have already recommended these to friends.
customer_reviews.author: cliffhanger3786

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting "noise cancelling" - i thought that meant it would block out all noises. Not for me. Ended up returning these and getting the ear bud version (Bose) - and they work fine. Also using w/hearing aids - and the ear buds are just fine the way they sit in the ear. These were just OK for me.
customer_reviews.author: R BTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and amazing sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, great acoustic noise cancelling, and fantastic sound quality. Doesn't make any noise cancelling hissing or negative feedback. Very portable. You can still hear people talk but it's dimmed down a lot and completely removes the "hum" effect so it sounds like they're on a speaker or something and doesn't disturb your music listening. Best quality headphones I've ever owned and I'm an audiophile.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Happy happy joy joy
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It was a father's day gift and my hubby was soooooo happy! It was supposed to arrive after father's day and arrived 4 days early which made ME veryyyy happy!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Ramos

customer_reviews.title: More uses than airplanes
customer_reviews.text: Love, love love them. Was skeptical, especially paying full price to Bose so I ordered these which were slightly used. They are an outstanding product, both for the airplane (to block out the drone of aircraft engines) and at home with my laptop when I don't want to hear the TV!
customer_reviews.author: Purrplemickey

customer_reviews.title: Had to have these!
customer_reviews.text: I had a QC2 headset but lost in during my last travels. Couldn't wait to order another. Really diminishes sounds to a point I can catch a nap anywhere. Amazon Prime is great..order placed on the 16th and delivered to my door on the 19th...wow, thanks
customer_reviews.author: HappyGrammie

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best headset until they start having the known issue with ...
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best headset until they start having the known issue with the right side malfunctioning after a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Shalom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I've ever owned. Music is crisp and clear with very little outside noise.
customer_reviews.author: KENWICK L BROWN

customer_reviews.title: I understand they don't make them with the rechargeable battery any longer so I was very happy to find them
customer_reviews.text: Yes. I have a pair and bought these for my son. I understand they don't make them with the rechargeable battery any longer so I was very happy to find them.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite F.

customer_reviews.title: and thus easily gets lost
customer_reviews.text: The battery keeps falling off, and thus easily gets lost. I would never recommend this headphones. They are garbage.
customer_reviews.author: MR I SANZ-PALOMINO

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had bought these years ago. Perfect to wear in the airline terminal to block the noise and gives the music a delightful sound for relaxing onboard. Box was a little scuffed but everything inside wrapped and new.
customer_reviews.author: C. Swisher

customer_reviews.title: Super fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping, came way before the expected date. The headphones came in fantastic/almost new condition even the case was in excellent condition. The headphones block out alot of background noise, super comfortable and the music quality is very good. Happy I bought this
customer_reviews.author: Angel Zamora

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I'm digging these headphones. it's been about three months since i ordered them and they have been working flawlessly. I wish the noise canceling was better but they still do the job on airplanes and other noisy places.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson J.

customer_reviews.title: An appreciated gift
customer_reviews.text: These are just as nice as I expected them to be. My husband uses them at work everyday. The quality of these headphones allows him to reduce the volume so that, hopefully, I won't have to yell at him when he is a man of a certain age.
customer_reviews.author: mjbbeads1

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize it was a "refurbished" headset. Nothing but cracking noise in the background of the movie.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda S.

customer_reviews.title: What a great set of headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These are really great headphones. I bought mine used and saved over half, and they were excellent in every respect.
customer_reviews.author: The Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with Bose QC3 headphones
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with these headphones - they arrived very promptly and were in very good condition. The quality/depth of the sound they produce - plus their noise-cancelling capacity are my idea of heaven! They pack neatly into the carrying case they came with: this makes them ideal for travel. I am impressed with the longevity of the rechargeable battery that was supplied with the headphones, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mr M Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but pricy
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Although long usage of this headphones causes some headache to me, maybe I am not use to headphones, overall quality is great and noise cancelation is also awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ajinkya

customer_reviews.title: Great Noise Cancelling feature!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are fantastic! Too bad Bose discontinued them. If you can pick up a used par I highly recommend the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: NuForce

customer_reviews.title: Bose Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these ear phones for their functionality. The price is high and the value is too. I like the little case that they come in for easy carrying. I love the ability to re charge the battery. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: PamGunn

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome and has helped my daughter who is in nursing ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome and has helped my daughter who is in nursing school be able to study with all the noise going on in the dorms!
customer_reviews.author: workforwhatyawant

customer_reviews.title: Battery lasts a good 8-10hrs.
customer_reviews.text: I don't fly or drive long distances without them. Makes cabin noise much more bearable! Battery lasts a good 8-10hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good set of refurbished headphones really happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Bose Noise Cancelling Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are great. On ear is softer than around the ear. Used these on 7 hour flight to Europe and they are the best. You cannot compare other products to Bose. Bose is the leader in noise cancelling headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Yak67

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy to have these! I love music and I also have a small face. This headset fits perfectly. Yes, I would purchase from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Never worked and seller never refunded purchase price upon returning the defective item.
customer_reviews.author: Edward D. Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Have compared to other brands. The Bose are best. The technology is amazing. If you fly at all, these are totally amazing.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: met all my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Product was just what I needed, good packaging, timely shipping Just as it should be. Since I did not have to ask for anything extra that's all I can say
customer_reviews.author: Bob Scott

customer_reviews.title: Always the best
customer_reviews.text: Abandoned Bose for V-MODA and went back to Bose. Noise Reduction and comfort can't be beat. Enough said, always the best.
customer_reviews.author: Master Guns99

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, breaks in less than 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: So I got these headphones and I loved them. Until one side stopped working. I called Bose and they offered me to exchange it for a new one for $190. The thing is, if I pay over $300 for headphones, I certainly don't think it's OK for them to stop working in less than 2 years, let alone pay another $190 to get them fixed/replaced. And It's not like I used them everywhere or kept dropping them or whatever. I work from home and they sit on my desk. I can't believe I actually recommended Bose products to people I know. I'll make a better use of those $190 in new headphones from another brand, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Bernardes Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Santa Claus thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Got these headphones for my hubby for Christmas, and they are a huge hit! He travels a lot and is enjoying using them on the airplane.
customer_reviews.author: Wedding Woman

customer_reviews.title: Bose, not beats.
customer_reviews.text: Bose. What more do you need to say! They sound terrific as the name stands for excellence. Clear, deep tones, excellent noise canceling. Much better than the beats crap everyone like to wear on their heads. If you want excellent sound, Bose can not be beat.
customer_reviews.author: JLFeeney

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Husband travels on long flights to Australia and loves these. Very comfortable, great for noise reduction and clarity of sound, Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great job by Unclaimed Baggage Center! Excellent condition just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L.

customer_reviews.title: Rather happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Rather happy with this purchase. Not a complete soundproof experience, but it allowed for a much quieter ride on the plane.
customer_reviews.author: D Adams

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Made their virgin voyage to Santiago Chile from Iowa and they were worth every penny! Allowed me to enjoy entertainment without cranking up the volume and also rest on the plane.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Kmett

customer_reviews.title: My husband was very happy with his gift!
customer_reviews.text: The headphones were just what my husband wanted and he is very happy with them. He especially thinks the noise-cancelling feature is very cool!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Knight

customer_reviews.title: I haven't tried them on an aircraft yet, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried them on an aircraft yet, but the sound elsewhere is clear and concise at the lowest volume.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Giglio

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are expensive, but worth every penny. It is amazing how much noise they block and the quality of sound. Bose did a great job!
customer_reviews.author: PAK

customer_reviews.title: I have the old and the new ..
customer_reviews.text: .. these being the new. What's nice in the new: - the size - the sound - the accessories (with the shipping plug combinations, virtually any kind of audio device can feed these beasts) What I'm not sure I like in the new: - rechargeable battery .. I would much rather carry a spare AA or AAA rather than forget to charge. - AC only charging .. why not USB, gang? - not over the ear (the old version is over the ear, which I find more comfortable) - the price (~$80 more than the old). Still, very serviceable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Coates

customer_reviews.title: A good choice
customer_reviews.text: No regrets here, one of the best noise cancelling headphones that does not irritate your ears when worn for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Misumi Kaizen

customer_reviews.title: Great if you want a smaller head set.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality and good noise canceling. Not as good as the QC 15's but still very good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price, sound quality is not impressing and low in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: very good and comfortable headphone
customer_reviews.text: it's very effective noise cancelling headphone. The cushion does get a bit warmer after a long usage, but for airplane use, it's the best in drowning the engine/ambiance noise.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rumalean

customer_reviews.title: all products
customer_reviews.text: like all of them, esp the bose headphones... wow! not inexpensive, but well worth it to me! I am really into great quality sound
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Doucet

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I'm a super elite traveller and travel for work every week to many places for past many years. I now regret that I hadn't bought this earlier. This is just an amazing product - cut about 90% of the flight noise. Nothing to complain - you should buy this if you travel often.
customer_reviews.author: Reuben

customer_reviews.title: Super Rad
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome. I especially love how they can be broken down into components. Very easy to bring around to my Starbucks office ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Monica L Israel

customer_reviews.title: Lovin' it
customer_reviews.text: these things are great. You can't go wrong for traveling which is all I really use them for as I wear earbuds to run and work in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Running in Place

customer_reviews.title: but holding up better than my last Bose headphones
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected, but holding up better than my last Bose headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Last pair lasted 10 years.
customer_reviews.text: The improvements in technology are noticeable. I like the fact that the batteries are now rechargeable. They are worth every penny. Bose is the leader is sound reproduction.
customer_reviews.author: yohann

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Everything I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: Use these primarily to shut out the loudmouths at work in an open office environment. These work great for that, and I can't wait to try them out on a flight.
customer_reviews.author: hokietrax

customer_reviews.title: Very happy woth the price and the supplier
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a replacement for one we lost on travel. Very happy woth the price and the supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne M

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I been taking this headphones everywhere I go. the noise cancelling technique is so good that when I take off the headphones, I put it back because I like the silence. Good thing I love about this technology is that it gets rid of annoying bus noises, humming noises from kitchen and stuff while it still let the sound of someone calling you or other noises that may save your life. Great outdoor headphones. But if you like powerful base and impact, you may want to try other headphones. this one is all-around kind headphones and I sometimes wish it to hit the beat more, well just sometimes when I feel like rock n roll
customer_reviews.author: Eva Kim

customer_reviews.title: It's a love / hate relationship
customer_reviews.text: The love: The noise cancelling function is fabulous. It's amazing how much stress just melts away when you remove that ambient noise. Unfortunately, that's all that is removed as you can still hear every word from the obnoxious guy in the seat behind you. Plugging in to music or some other sound source eliminates that guy too! The hate: I have been traveling with these weekly for about two months and they are painful to wear after about an hour, especially if I have my glasses on. Sadly, I'm returning these and purchased the in-ear version to try instead.
customer_reviews.author: Averna Jumps

customer_reviews.title: Study Buddy
customer_reviews.text: My son is a college sophomore at a small private college in the South. He studies anywhere he can but his room can be noisy. He has taken to listening to white noise through his ear buds to drown out the TV, conversation, etc. I bought these for a Christmas gift and HE LOVES THEM! He has had them on the whole holiday. Great gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved the headphones. The noise canceling feature worked well. She is looking forward to using them on her long business flights. My husband also has these and uses them on his flights and for work in busy office environments. We could sit in the tv room listening to our music with these no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Su Mellor

customer_reviews.title: Bose quiet comfort 3 acoustic noise cancelling headphones
customer_reviews.text: The headphones were exactly what I was looking for and its nice that they are lighter then the ones I bought 4 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Just wish the battery lasted a bit longer. The noise cancellation really helps me work when there are other noises going on around me. Overall, I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of Headphones.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of audible sound is incredible, I have a concert every night and I love it. Doesn't matter if the volume is up or down the audio is just unbelievable. The noise cancelling works great.
customer_reviews.author: Baron J Littleton

customer_reviews.title: must recommend. the best product in a long long time
customer_reviews.text: must recommend.the best product in a long long time.the best price too.
customer_reviews.author: khalid

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great service
customer_reviews.text: After using the Senheisser MX headphones, I found the loudness too low for me. The Bose QC3 is the perfect improvement with better sound cancellation and sound loudness. The battery also lasts a lot longer. Service provider was fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Roland Schoell

product_meta.title: Bose QuietComfort 3 Acoustic Noise Cancelling Headphones, Black
product_meta.description:
Compact, on-ear Quiet Comfort 3 headphones offer a proven combination of Bose noise reduction, audio performance and comfortable fit. Proprietary Bose technologies deliver quality sound from these award-winning headphones - and make listening a pleasure just about anywhere.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


BOSE® QUIETCOMFORT® 3 ACOUSTIC NOISE CANCELLING® HEADPHONES
 * High-performing noise reduction headphones for travel, work and home
 * Enjoy your music and movies even more, with clear and lifelike sound
 * Comfortable and lightweight on-ear fit
 * Includes two audio cables, one with mic/remote for iPhone®/iPod® control and hands-free calling
 * Rechargeable lithium-ion battery, charger and carrying case also included

SEPARATE THE NOISE FROM THE MUSIC
Leave the noise behind, and get the most from your music. QuietComfort 3 headphones offer a proven combination of Bose noise reduction and audio performance with a comfortable on-ear fit. These award-winning headphones deliver clear, lifelike sound, making listening a pleasure just about anywhere.

PROVEN PERFORMANCE
Advanced noise reduction and a comfortable fit let you enjoy hours of easy listening. QC3 headphones feature Bose Acoustic Noise Cancelling technology to electronically identify, then dramatically reduce, the noise around you. You're left with the music you love—or the simple serenity you desire. Proprietary signal processing and audio reproduction technology also provide lifelike performance across the full range of sound—including deep low tones—from small and lightweight headphones.

CREATE A COMFORTABLE ESCAPE
Think of your noisy office, or the bustling activity in train stations and other public places. At the flip of a switch, that background noise is reduced to a whisper. That’s when the high quality sound these headphones provide becomes even more apparent. You’ll hear more of your music—without having to turn up your music. And the soft-cushioned, easy-on-the-ears fit lets you listen comfortably for hours.

TAKE CALLS. TAKE CONTROL
QC3 headphones come with a cable customized for select Apple products. A three-button remote and microphone let you take calls on your iPhone and control music functions on other Apple devices. You can also purchase a mobile kit that lets your QC headphones work with other cell phones, too.

QC3 headphones make an ideal travel companion, effectively reducing the noise around you to create a more tranquil environment. FINE TRAVELING COMPANIONS
QC3 headphones come with a rechargeable lithium-ion battery and convenient wall charger. You can expect 25 hours of use from a fully charged battery, with a lifespan of approximately 500 charging cycles. An airline adapter plug and protective carrying case are also included. Earcups fold flat for easy storage in the slim case.

 * Acoustic Noise Cancelling® headphone technology, a proprietary Bose innovation, electronically identifies and reduces noise while faithfully preserving the audio or tranquility you desire.
 * Compact on-ear design with proprietary soft cushions that establish a critical acoustical seal - helping to further reduce noise while providing a comfortable fit.
 * TriPort® acoustic headphone structure, another Bose exclusive, features tiny vents in the earcups to enable a tonally-balanced audio performance - including reproduction of deep, low notes - from relatively small and lightweight headphones.
 * Active equalization electronically tunes the headphones' frequency response, enabling outstanding audio performance.
 *  Inline microphone and remote for select Apple products 
 * Rechargeable lithium-ion battery provides an average of 25 hours of reliable use per charge. Small wall charger also included.
 * Interchangeable audio cables, one for general use, and one just for select Apple products, offer greater convenience than permanently connected Y-cables.
 * Inline microphone allows for hands-free iPhone conversation and access to certain voice applications, such as VoiceOver and Voice Control, in other Apple products.
 * Inline three-button remote switches between calls and music, and controls volume, track selection and voice applications on select Apple products.
 * Fold-flat earcups rotate 90 degrees for easy storage and portability in the included case.
 * Slim carrying case helps protect headphones and accessories during travel.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Overall headphone dimensions 7.38"H x 5.25"W ( 19 cm x 13.5 cm ) Ear cushion outside dimensions 2.88"H x 2.25"W ( 7.5 cm x 6 cm ) Weight with cable 4.8 oz (136.1 g) Battery output power 3.7VDC, 200mAh Battery life Approximately 25 hours per charge; 500 charging cycles WHAT'S IN THE BOX
 * QuietComfort 3 headphones
 * QuietComfort 3 inline remote and microphone cable (detachable)
 * Standard audio cable (detachable)
 * Rechargeable lithium-ion battery
 * Battery charger
 * Carrying case
 * Airline adapter

QUIETCOMFORT® 3 ACCESSORIES
QuietComfort® 3 Rechargeable Lithium-ion Battery --Additional battery for QuietComfort 3 headphones. Especially handy for extra-long trips. Provides up to 25 hours run time per charge. 
QuietComfort® 3 Mobile Communications Kit --Bring all the benefits of Bose QuietComfort 3 Acoustic Noise Cancelling headphones to your mobile phone. An enhanced inline microphone lets you switch seamlessly between music and calls with the push of a button, while providing clearer communications. This mobile communications kit works with most Android, Blackberry and Windows phones as well as iPhone and other mobile devices. SIMILAR BOSE PRODUCTS TO CONSIDER
Bose® QuietComfort® 15 Acoustic Noise Cancelling® headphones --The best QuietComfort headphones from Bose reduce even more noise across a wider range of frequencies - using advanced electronics and newly developed ear cushions. They're quieter than ever before, with Bose quality sound and a fit that stays comfortable for hours.
feature_bullets: High-performing noise reduction for home, work or travel
Rich, detailed audio highlights musical nuances
Comfortable, on-ear fit for hours of easy listening
Includes two audio cables, one with mic/remote for iPhone/iPod control and hands-free iPhone calling, and a travel case
25 hours of use on average from rechargeable Li-ion battery; includes charger
